Marine Community Profile v2.0 to ISO 19115-1 Mapping
====================================================

This document contains the mapping of Marine Community Profile v2.0 to ISO 19115-1 performed by the AODN
Metadata Mapping Working Group.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
